author: remm
msg: - The context needs to be registered in JMX before starting the pipeline.
Otherwise, the valves will not get unregistered properly when undeploying.
- I hope this does not cause other problems, but a fix was clearly needed.

author: remm
msg: - Replace JAR URL code with regular JAR files (as the CL is forced to generate
- Struts is locking iteslf up. My theory is that it is caused by loading up a DTD
for validation by the XML parser through a JAR URL without setting caches to false.

author: remm
msg: - Use regular file URLs with everything from /WEB-INF/lib.
- I'm not sure this is useful, and will be reverted to rev 1.12 otherwise.

author: remm
msg: - This should be configurable eventually, but I think it should work fine
